exceptions.exn: In environment V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat Unable to unify "p" with "dp_proj_par p".

original: apply dp_eval_ext. intros v H1 i H2. destruct (le_lt_dec n i). - rewrite dp_proj_par_equation_2. rewrite H1. reflexivity. - unfold dp_proj_par. rewrite nat2pos_not_le. reflexivity.
